suggestions.original: To further enhance the deformation dimension, consider exaggerating the proportions of the character's limbs and facial features even more to emphasize the whimsical and imaginative nature of the scene. Additionally, you could experiment with more dynamic poses and expressions for the animals and objects to create a greater sense of movement and chaos. Enhancing the contrast between the character's struggle and the weight of the books and schoolbag on the other side of the balance could also add to the overall impact. Finally, refining the background elements to complement the main scene without overwhelming it could help in maintaining focus on the central theme.

suggestions.added: Students can draw the book bag a little bigger to highlight the stress more.
